word:
A voice spoke to me, "Beware and not place your dependence upon Fannie, to prepare articles or to make books. She cuts out words that should appear, and places her own ideas and words in their stead, and because she had done this she has become deceived, deluded, and is deceiving and deluding others. She is your adversary."--Letter 59, 1894. (To O. A. Olsen, February 5, 1894.) 


                                  -324-
